channel.title: CVE Feed for rsyslog -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for rsyslog -- all products

item.title: CVE-2011-1490|2024-08-06T22:28:41.394Z -- rsyslog -- rsyslog
item.description: A memory leak in rsyslog before 5.7.6 was found in the way deamon processed log messages are logged when multiple rulesets were used and some output batches contained messages belonging to more than one ruleset. A local attacker could cause denial of the rsyslogd daemon service via a log message belonging to more than one ruleset

item.title: CVE-2011-1488|2024-08-06T22:28:41.761Z -- rsyslog -- rsyslog
item.description: A memory leak in rsyslog before 5.7.6 was found in the way deamon processed log messages are logged when $RepeatedMsgReduction was enabled. A local attacker could use this flaw to cause a denial of the rsyslogd daemon service by crashing the service via a sequence of repeated log messages sent within short periods of time.

item.title: CVE-2011-1489|2024-08-06T22:28:41.423Z -- rsyslog -- rsyslog
item.description: A memory leak in rsyslog before 5.7.6 was found in the way deamon processed log messages were logged when multiple rulesets were used and some output batches contained messages belonging to more than one ruleset. A local attacker could cause denial of the rsyslogd daemon service via a log message belonging to more than one ruleset.
